aps	B-category

aps	B-category

of	O

aps	B-category
BACKGROUND	O
:	O

is	O
a	O

used	O
antineoplastic	O
.	O

aps	B-category

.	O

aps	B-category

:	O

mannitol	B-Chemical
.	O

aps	B-category
Metformin	B-Chemical
protects	O
against	O
seizures	O
,	O
learning	O
and	O
memory	O
impairments	O
and	O
oxidative	O
damage	O
induced	O
by	O

-	O
induced	O
kindling	O
in	O
mice	O
.	O

aps	B-category
Cognitive	O
impairment	O
,	O
the	O
most	O
common	O
and	O
severe	O
comorbidity	O
of	O
epilepsy	O
,	O
greatly	O
diminishes	O
the	O
quality	O
of	O
life	O
.	O

aps	B-category
However	O
,	O
current	O
therapeutic	O
interventions	O
for	O
epilepsy	O
can	O
also	O
cause	O
untoward	O

effects	O
.	O

aps	B-category

,	O

is	O

need	O
for	O
new	O
kinds	O
of	O
agents	O
targeting	O
both	O
seizures	O
and	O
cognition	O
deficits	O
.	O

aps	B-category
Oxidative	O
stress	O
is	O
considered	O
